Package com.qualco.nationsapp.controller

Class NationsRestController

java.lang.Object
com.qualco.nationsapp.controller.NationsRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/nationapi") @Validated public class NationsRestController extends Object
RestController that exposes endpoints that enable the functionality required by the assignment's tasks.

  • Method Details

    • getAllCountries

      @GetMapping("/countries") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<BasicCountryEntry>>> getAllCountries(@RequestParam(name="page",defaultValue="0") @Min(0L) @Min(0L) Integer page, @RequestParam(name="items_in_page",defaultValue="5") @Min(1L) @Min(1L) Integer size, @RequestParam(name="sort_by_field",defaultValue="name") @NonNull @NotBlank @NonNull @NotBlank String sortByField, @RequestParam(name="sort_order",defaultValue="ASC") @NonNull @NonNull SortOrder sortOrder) throws InvalidSortByFieldException
      GET endpoint that answers task 1(a): An endpoint that returns the name, area, country_code2 for all countries. Implemented with pagination and sorting.
      Parameters:
      page - The page of data to return.
      size - The number of entries per page.
      sortByField - The field to sort the results by. Supported: "name", "area", "country_code2"
      sortOrder - The ordering of the sort required: ASC or DESC.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with HTTP Status 200 OK and a list of EntityModel wrappers over BasicCountryEntry instances, one per country, or a different status code and helpful message.
      Throws:
      InvalidSortByFieldException - If the field to sort by is not one of "name", "area", "country_code2".
      jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException - If there is some other violation of constraints for sorting / pagination parameters.

    • getLanguagesOfCountry

      @GetMapping("/languages/{countryName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<CountryAndLanguageEntry>>> getLanguagesOfCountry(@PathVariable @NotBlank @NotBlank String countryName) throws CountryNotFoundException
      GET endpoint that enables task 1(b): getting all the spoken languages of a given country. Because of the small average number of languages per country, we do not implement this query using pagination and sorting.
      Parameters:
      countryName - The country to find the spoken languages of.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity with HTTP status 200 OK and a list of EntityModel wrappers over CountryAndLanguageEntry instances, one per language spoken in the provided country.
      Throws:
      CountryNotFoundException - If the country provided was not found in our database.

    • getMaxGdpPerCapita

      @GetMapping("/maxgdppercapita") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<MaxGDPPerCapitaEntry>>> getMaxGdpPerCapita(@RequestParam(name="page",defaultValue="0") @Min(0L) @Min(0L) Integer page, @RequestParam(name="items_in_page",defaultValue="5") @Min(1L) @Min(1L) Integer size, @RequestParam(name="sort_by_field",defaultValue="name") @NotBlank @NotBlank String sortByField, @RequestParam(name="sort_order",defaultValue="ASC") @NonNull @NonNull SortOrder sortOrder) throws InvalidSortByFieldException, jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException
      GET Endpoint that implements task 2 of the instructions; getting the name, country_code3 and maximum GDP for all countries across all years of data.
      Parameters:
      page - The page of data to return.
      size - The number of entries per page.
      sortByField - The field to sort the results by. Supported: "name", "country_code3", "maxGDPPerCapita"
      sortOrder - The ordering of the sort required: ASC or DESC.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity over with HTTP Status 200 OK and a List of EntityModel wrappers over MaxGDPPerCapitaEntry instances, one per country, or a different status code and a helpful message in the case of an unsuccessful request.
      Throws:
      InvalidSortByFieldException - if the field to sort by provided was not one of "name", "country_code3", "maxGDPPerCapita"
      jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException - If there is some other violation of constraints for sorting / pagination parameters.

    • getStats

      @GetMapping("/stats") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<StatsEntry>>> getStats(@RequestParam(name="page",defaultValue="0") @Min(0L) @Min(0L) Integer page, @RequestParam(name="items_in_page",defaultValue="5") @Min(1L) @Min(1L) Integer size, @RequestParam(name="sort_by_field",defaultValue="continent_name") @NotBlank @NotBlank String sortByField, @RequestParam(name="sort_order",defaultValue="ASC") @NonNull @NonNull SortOrder sortOrder, @RequestParam(name="year_from",required=false) String yearFrom, @RequestParam(name="year_to",required=false) String yearTo, @RequestParam(name="region",required=false) String region) throws InvalidSortByFieldException, BadDateFormatException, jakarta.validation.ValidationException
      GET endpoint that implements task 3 of the instructions; get the continent, region, country, year, population and gdp of all countries, optionally applying filters for the years or the region. If the filters result in an empty response, we still return HTTP 200 OK and the empty response.
      Parameters:
      page - The page of data to return.
      size - The number of entries per page.
      sortByField - The field to sort the results by. Supported: "continent_name", "region_name", "country_name", "year", "population", "gdp".
      sortOrder - The ordering of the sort required: ASC or DESC.
      yearFrom - Optional parameter. The first year to include results of.
      yearTo - Optional parameter. The last year to include results of.
      region - Optional parameter. The region to limit our results to.
      Returns:
      Α ResponseEntity with HTTP Status 200 OK and a List of EntityModel wrappers over StatsEntry instances, one per country that satisfies the filters, if any, or a different status code and helpful message.
      Throws:
      InvalidSortByFieldException - If the field to sort by is not one of "continent_name", "region_name", "country_name", "year", "population", or "gdp"
      BadDateFormatException - If either one of the years specified is not in YYYY format.
      jakarta.validation.ValidationException - If the " region " parameter is provided, but it maps to an empty string.
      jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException - If there is some other violation of constraints for sorting / pagination parameters.

    • getStats

      @GetMapping("/stats/{region}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<org.springframework.hateoas.EntityModel<StatsEntry>>> getStats(@RequestParam(name="page",defaultValue="0") @Min(0L) @Min(0L) Integer page, @RequestParam(name="items_in_page",defaultValue="5") @Min(1L) @Min(1L) Integer size, @RequestParam(name="sort_by_field",defaultValue="continent_name") @NotBlank @NotBlank String sortByField, @RequestParam(name="sort_order",defaultValue="ASC") @NonNull @NonNull SortOrder sortOrder, @PathVariable @NotBlank @NotBlank String region) throws InvalidSortByFieldException
      GET endpoint similar to getStats(Integer, Integer, String, SortOrder, String, String, String) that takes the region as a path variable. It is mostly useful for StatsEntryAssembler to provide a useful link in the ResponseEntity link field for that endpoint.
      Parameters:
      page - The page of data to return.
      size - The number of entries per page.
      sortByField - The field to sort the results by. Supported: "continent_name", "region_name", "country_name", "year", "population", "gdp".
      sortOrder - The ordering of the sort required: ASC or DESC.
      region - The region to get data of.
      Returns:
      Α ResponseEntity with HTTP Status 200 OK and a List of EntityModel wrappers over StatsEntry instances, one per country that satisfies the filters, if any, or a different status code and helpful message.
      Throws:
      InvalidSortByFieldException - If the field to sort by is not one of "continent_name", "region_name", "country_name", "year", "population", or "gdp"
      BadDateFormatException - If either one of the years specified is not in YYYY format.
      jakarta.validation.ValidationException - If the " region " parameter is provided, but it maps to an empty string.
      jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException - If there is some other violation of constraints for sorting / pagination parameters.
